message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I know it's worth a lot to you, so I'm offering it to you for $175. It's a great deal! Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't pay more than $120. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need at least $140 for this to be worthwhile.  Let me know if you're able to meet me halfway.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but $130 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $135. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. I am willing to pay $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
